name: Salacius Crumb's Small Journey (LD38)
description:
Made for the Ludum Dare 38 in 72 hours

We are crumbs, living between the keys of your keyboards. And we want to be free! Escape from home and search the HUGE WORLD. May the Great Bread be with you.

Inspired in Cambell's "Hero's Journey",.

Controls
  • You only need to click to the adyacent key to move to it!
  • Travel around this tiny keyboard-world to escape!
Credits:
  • Azahara Lucas: Fingers and Keyboard Code
  • Roldán García: Art and dialogs.
    • GameJolt profile, personal web
  • J. Felipe Molina: Character Controller and Music.
    • Itch.io profile, Cervantes, perdiendo los papeles game
